EYB:ForceStance.NAME: Force Stance
DESCRIPTION: Gain #yForce upon entering or exiting this stance.  While in this stance, you gain #b{0} Strength and enemies deal #b{1}% more damage.

EYB:AgilityStance.NAME: Agility Stance
DESCRIPTION: Gain #yAgility upon entering or exiting this stance. While in this stance, you gain #b{0} Dexterity and if you take any unblocked damage this turn, lose #b{1} next turn.

EYB:IntellectStance.NAME: Intellect Stance
DESCRIPTION: Gain #yIntellect upon entering or exiting this stance. While in this stance, you gain #b{0} Focus.  Force, Agility, nor Intellect do not decrease.
